description: Try this vegetarian one-tray wonder for your next midweek feast. Haloumi is paired with roast potatoes and a host of other veg to make one tasty dish.
keywords: Crispy Potato and Haloumi Salad Traybake
name: Crispy Potato and Haloumi Salad Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g Woolworths Simply Steam baby white potato

recipeInstructions.text: Using back of a fork, squash garlic cloves and discard skins. Combine garlic in a bowl with lemon juice. Season with pepper. Add to potato mixture and stir to combine. Serve topped with rocket.
